title: ENCODE Biosample Donor
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE biosample Donor

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

accession.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
accession.title: Donor Accession

lab.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Lab UUID or Name
lab.title: Lab

award.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
award.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
award.title: Award Name

age.description: Age or stage of the donor organism when sampled
age.title: Donor Age/Stage

age_units.description: Units for age or lifecycle stage of the donor organism when sampled
age_units.title: Donor Age/Stage Units

lab_aliases.description: List of lab IDs or cross-references
lab_aliases.title: Lab Aliases

parents.description: List of donors related as (literal) parent to this donor
parents.title: Parents

donor.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Parent

children.description: List of donors related as (literal) children to this donor
children.title: Children

donor.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Child

siblings.description: List of donors related as (literal) siblings to this donor
siblings.title: Siblings

donor.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Sibling Donor

littermates.description: List of donors related as littermates to this (mouse) donor
littermates.title: Littermates

donor.description: Another donor mouse from the same litter
donor.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
donor.title: Littermate

fraternal_twin.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
fraternal_twin.title: Fraternal Twin

identical_twin.description: Another donor mouse from the same litter
identical_twin.comment: For automated submission supply an ENCODE donor accession or uuid
identical_twin.title: Littermate

strain_background.description: Strain background of a non-human donor
strain_background.title: Strain Background

strain_name.description: Specific strain name of a non-human donor
strain_name.title: Strain Name
